Once again it was hard to find any good DVD5 version of this great scifi movie. I found NTSC and DVD9 version. It was so close that I could put this to DVD5 without compression but no way. Now there is absolutely nothing unnessecary. If I had removed some subtitles I would get reduction level level 99 %, but I think that people like to have own subtitles.
I even removed all VTS that you dont need and programmed menu commands one by one. Menus takes now only 2.68 MB and audio 346 MB and rest is for picture. 
I was doing some other things some time and it&#039;s nice to be back. I hope you like this one.
